name: Angela
appearance: A woman of average build and appearance, able to blend into crowds easily. Dresses practically and inconspicuously, with nothing that draws overt attention.
personality: Cautious, street-smart, pragmatic, and opportunistic. She is emotionally detached from most dealings and prioritizes self-preservation and profit.
background: Angela is a long-time drug dealer who maintains regular transactions with Lux Lynch. She deals in marijuana, Arabian tea, and several psychoactive substances such as methylphenidate. She operates on the fringes of Cassandra’s social circles and avoids becoming deeply involved in the town’s darker mysteries.
goals: Maintain her drug trade without drawing police attention
Continue profitable dealings with trusted partners
secrets: She is involved in the distribution of multiple illegal psychoactive substances
She knows more about local underground trade networks than she admits

clues.clueText: She regularly trades drugs with Lux Lynch.

relationships.description: A regular trading partner in illegal substances.
relationships.history: Angela has conducted long-term drug transactions with Lux, forming a mutually beneficial business relationship.

notes: Angela is a minor NPC and does not actively participate in the investigators’ main investigation unless directly approached.
